程序包的使用
org.apache.flink.api.common.state

  • 使用org.apache.flink.api.common.state的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.flink.api.common.functions  
    org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.util  
    org.apache.flink.api.common.state  
  • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions使用的org.apache.flink.api.common.state中的类 
    类和说明
    ListState
    State interface for partitioned list state in Operations.
    ListStateDescriptor
    A StateDescriptor for ListState.
    OperatorState
    已过时。 
    OperatorState has been replaced by ValueState.
    ReducingState
    State interface for reducing state.
    ReducingStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for ReducingState.
    ValueState
    State interface for partitioned single-value state.
    ValueStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for ValueState.
  • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.util使用的org.apache.flink.api.common.state中的类 
    类和说明
    ListState
    State interface for partitioned list state in Operations.
    ListStateDescriptor
    A StateDescriptor for ListState.
    OperatorState
    已过时。 
    OperatorState has been replaced by ValueState.
    ReducingState
    State interface for reducing state.
    ReducingStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for ReducingState.
    ValueState
    State interface for partitioned single-value state.
    ValueStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for ValueState.
  • org.apache.flink.api.common.state使用的org.apache.flink.api.common.state中的类 
    类和说明
    AppendingState
    Base interface for partitioned state that supports adding elements and inspecting the current state.
    FoldingState
    State interface for folding state.
    FoldingStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for FoldingState.
    ListState
    State interface for partitioned list state in Operations.
    ListStateDescriptor
    A StateDescriptor for ListState.
    MergingState
    Extension of AppendingState that allows merging of state.
    OperatorState
    已过时。 
    OperatorState has been replaced by ValueState.
    ReducingState
    State interface for reducing state.
    ReducingStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for ReducingState.
    State
    Interface that different types of partitioned state must implement.
    StateBackend
    The StateBackend is used by StateDescriptor instances to create actual state representations.
    StateDescriptor
    Base class for state descriptors.
    ValueState
    State interface for partitioned single-value state.
    ValueStateDescriptor
    StateDescriptor for ValueState.
